qas.question: Where was the first showing of Spectre held?
On what date was Spectre first shown for general audiences?
What movie prompted IMAX to show Spectre?
What film opening was changed so it didn't compete with Spectre?
Which film had a wider release in the UK, Skyfall or Spectre?
Spectre had its world premiere on 26 December of what year?
Who had its world premiere at Westminster Hall?
Who pushed back the release of Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation to avoid competing with Spectre?
IMAX announced that Spectre would be screened in its cinemas in January of what year?
In the UK, Spectre received a smaller release than what?

context: <b6_0>Spectre<b6_0/> had its world premiere in London on <a1_0>26 October <b5_0>2015<b5_0/><a1_0/> at the <a0_0>Royal Albert Hall<a0_0/>, the same day as its general release in the United Kingdom and Republic of Ireland. Following the announcement of the start of filming, <b7_0>Paramount Pictures<b7_0/> brought forward the release of <a3_0>Mission: Impossible – Rogue Nation<a3_0/> to avoid competing with <a4_0>Spectre.<a4_0/> In March <b8_0>2015<b8_0/> IMAX corporation announced that Spectre would be screened in its cinemas, following <a2_0>Skyfall<a2_0/>'s success with the company. In the UK it received a wider release than <b9_0>Skyfall<b9_0/>, with a minimum of 647 cinemas including 40 IMAX screens, compared to Skyfall's 587 locations and 21 IMAX screens.
